text: The Egret Hunter is an American silent film produced by Kalem Company and directed by Sidney Olcott with Gene Gauntier and James Vincent in the leading roles. ==Production notes== The film was shot in Jacksonville, Florida. ==References== * The Moving Picture World, vol 6, p. 703, p. 832\. * The New York Dramatic Mirror, 14 mai 1910, p. 20-21. ==External links== * * * The Egret Hunter website dedicated to Sidney Olcott Category:1910 films Category:American drama films Category:American silent short films Category:Films set in Florida Category:Films shot in Jacksonville, Florida Category:Films directed by Sidney Olcott Category:1910 short films Category:1910 drama films Category:American black-and-white films Category:American films
title: The Egret Hunter
